idioms.word: 待てば海路の日和あり
idioms.reading: まてばかいろのひよりあり
idioms.meaning: good things come to those who wait

lessons.japanese: 待てば海路の日和あり。
lessons.indonesian: Everything comes to those who wait.

lessons.japanese: 待てば海路の日和あり。
lessons.indonesian: It is a long lane that has no turning.

lessons.japanese: 待てば海路の日和あり。
lessons.indonesian: Everything comes to those who wait.

lessons.japanese: 待てば海路の日和あり。
lessons.indonesian: It is a long lane that has no turning.

lessons.japanese: 待てば海路の日和あり。
lessons.indonesian: Everything comes to him who waits.

lessons.japanese: 待てば海路の日和あり。
lessons.indonesian: It is a long road that has no turning.

lessons.japanese: 待てば海路の日和あり。
lessons.indonesian: Everything comes to him who waits.

lessons.japanese: 待てば海路の日和あり。
lessons.indonesian: It is a long road that has no turning.

lessons.japanese: 陸路を運ぶのは大変ですが、海路で運ぶのは簡単です。
lessons.indonesian: It's very difficult to transport them overland, but simple to do so by sea.

lessons.japanese: 陸路を運ぶのは大変ですが、海路で運ぶのは簡単です。
lessons.indonesian: It's very difficult to transport them overland, but simple to do so by sea.
